cell-methods: Error: area: time: mean where sea_ice (mask=siconc) not found in cell methods, please register
description: Area fraction of sea-ice surface that is covered by open melt ponds, that is melt ponds that are not covered by snow or ice lids. This represents the effective (i.e. radiatively-active) melt pond area fraction.
ui-label: Fraction of Sea Ice Covered by Effective Melt Pond
